snippet.title: ZODIAC XX - "Rise Up" Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Zodiac XX is an explosive single-player underwater arcade dogfighting drama set in a brave new near-future world not unlike our own. Join the ranks of Constellation Endeavor in their revolutionary struggle to prevent a global conflict at the hands of the Annovian regime - as captain, the fate of your squadmates - and the Annovian people - is in your hands. The tide yet rises.

+ Immerse yourself in a bold campaign from the mind of Ethan Redd, and take command of the elite Zodiac Fighter Squadron in challenging action-packed strike operations that will test your mettle and resolve
+ Feel the rush of piloting a varied array of ultra-maneuverable aquatic "sinker" fighters, and fight in the seas and skies like never before
+ Experience the narrative from the perspectives of your 6 AI squadmates, each with persistent progression and unique dialogue
+ Enjoy an electrifying all-new OST featuring music from 2 Mello, Skybridge, and Myrone

Written and Produced - Ethan Redd
Concept art and Character Design - Seth Redd
Sound Design - 2 Mello
OST - 2 Mello, Skybridge, Myrone

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
Subscribe for more neomedia from the future.
Twitter: @VirtuosoComms
Insta: @virtuosoofficial
